summary: New player home, for your evil vampire/necromancer characters :) Little free form vampire hunting quest for those of you so inclined :)
descriptionHtml:
=== Tomb of the Volkihar 1.0 ===

							==By Niallbob==

==Description==
---------------

Welcome to my very first mod!

I couldn\'t find a mod on the nexus which could be my perfect vampire home :( This mod adds a semi-lore friendly vampire tomb, which can be used as
a player home, or for those of you who despise the undead, it can kick off a personal quest to hunt down the Volkihar vampires of Skyrim!

Used as a player home, it has a bedroom with storage chests and an alchemy/enchanting table, a prison, a torture room, pretty cool entrance hall/council chamber for the Volkihar 
council with appropriate trap. Be careful how you enter the tomb! You\'ll receive a note when you start which should point you in the direction of the tomb (if you cant work out where it
is, there is a screenshot on the nexus).

I have tried to personalise it as much as I could. It does look like an evil place to spend the day sleeping.

As this is my first mod and I dont know how popular it will be, I will not be updating it very regularly. It\'s quite simple to personalise it on your own in the CK though :)

The vampire hunt quest is not a scripted quest, its a freeform quest that does not appear in your journal. It essentially adds a note to the vampire boss in the tomb,
which will point you in the direction of the other Volkihar vampires in Skyrim.



==Installation==

Extract the .esp to your data folder or use the NMM.



==Conflicts==

Again, as this is my first mod I cannot gaurantee no conflicts, although I cant see where there would be any. Other than the space the entrance takes up in the external world.



==Permissions==

You can use this mod or parts of it for whatever you like. I only ask that you state me as the author of the original mod 
and let me know if your using it in your mod, so I can check and see how you\'ve made it cooler :)



Thats all folks.

Niall
author: Niallbob
